tool_description: Get keyword suggestions from a keyword seed.
name: Keyword Suggestions
title: Keyword Suggestions

api_list.name: Keyword Suggestions
api_list.description: Get keyword suggestions from a keyword seed.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://keyword-suggestions.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "keyword-suggestions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://keyword-suggestions.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "keyword-suggestions.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
